topic.title: Create and load a CSV file

section.title: Create and load a CSV file
Create a CSV file
section.p: Large organizations typically have a data administrator or department the builds ETL processes. If the data you want is in another system, speak with your ThoughtSpot administrator about getting CSV files extracted from this system.

section.title: Troubleshoot uploads
section.p: Boolean data must use TRUE/FALSE values. Other values such as Y/N are not supported.
